Download / Main link: 9,000 images sampled from Snow100K, 1,069 from Raindrop, and 9,000 Outdoor-Rain images aggregated for all-weather restoration.
column9: Subset of Snow100K and raindrop/rain datasets already in literature.[file:1]

Download / Main link: Cityscapes-derived synthetic fog dataset: 500 dense fog, 500 medium fog, 500 clear reference images.
column9: Common benchmark for foggy driving scene understanding.[file:1]

Download / Main link: Fuji subset of the SID (See-in-the-Dark) dataset with 2,397 short-exposure low-light images and 193 corresponding long-exposure reference images.
High-quality night rain dataset with 10,000 training, 300 test, and 900 validation rain images under low-light conditions.
Part of RESIDE-Standard: 1,399 clear, 1,399 hazy, 1,399 transmission maps for indoor synthetic haze.

Description: LOw-Light (LOL) paired dataset: 485 low/normal-light training pairs and 15 testing pairs for supervised low-light enhancement.
Download / Main link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=157bjO1_cFuSd0HWDUoAmcHRJDVyWpOxB
Synthetic image pairs from RAW images: 1,000 low-light and 1,000 corresponding high-quality images.
column9: Extension of LOL with RAW-based synthesis.[file:1]

Description: Seven test sets with a total of about 200 images for benchmarking low-light enhancement.
Download / Main link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1OvHuzPBZRBMDWV5AKI-TtIxPCYY8EW70
Extra link / notes: Additional unpaired evaluation sets for LLIE.[file:1]

Download / Main link: Large-scale synthetic raindrop dataset with 67,500 image pairs for raindrop removal.
column9: Includes separate download link for models/data.[file:1]

Description: NTIRE 2020 NH-HAZE challenge dataset with 55 clear and 55 heterogeneous real-world hazy images.
Download / Main link: https://data.vision.ee.ethz.ch/cvl/ntire20/nh-haze/files/NH-HAZE.zip
NKUSR8K dataset for natural image super-resolution research with 1,003 high-resolution images.
column9: Not weather-specific but useful for SR baselines.[file:1]

Description: Outdoor haze dataset with 45 clear and 45 corresponding real hazy images.
Download / Main link: http://www.vision.ee.ethz.ch/ntire18/o-haze/O-HAZE.zip
Rainy version of Cityscapes: 9,432 training and 1,188 test images with depth maps, for deraining and segmentation.

Description: Deraining dataset with 100 rainy and 100 ground-truth clear images.
Download / Main link: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/adeshpal/rain-100l
Training: 12,600 rainy/clean pairs; testing: 1,400 rainy/clean pairs across multiple rain streak patterns.
REalistic Single Image DEhazing, outdoor track: OTS (72,135 synthetic) and RTTS (4,322 real hazy traffic images).
column9: Outdoor dehazing benchmark for real and synthetic haze.[file:1]

Download / Main link: Standard RESIDE track: ITS (13,990 synthetic indoor), SOTS (500 synthetic test), HSTS (20 hard test images).
Real-world haze dataset of 3,053 paired hazy and corresponding haze-free images for single-image dehazing.
Real-world early-stage fire surveillance smoke benchmark with 9,875 training pairs and 100 test pairs.
Synthetic snow dataset Snow100K-S/M/L (~33k each) with paired clean/snowy images.
Dataset derived from Cityscapes with 2,975 clean and about 8,925 snowy images across three density levels.
Snowy KITTI 2012 with 7,481 clean images × 3 snow levels, totaling 22,443 snow/clean pairs.
Sony subset of SID with 2,697 short-exposure low-light images and 231 long-exposure reference images.
Synthetic Remote Sensing Fog dataset with 500 scenes and 13,800 noisy images plus GT/depth/semantic annotations.
WeatherBench image restoration dataset with 41,402 training and 600 test pairs at 512×512 resolution for haze, rain, and snow.
000 images
Extra link / notes: Massive haze-aware dataset with over 130k clean images and about 2M hazy images across multiple haze types and intensities (fog, environmental haze, cloud).
column10: Provides synthetic and real hazy subsets for classification and dehazing.[web:6]

Description: Remote-sensing-oriented dehazing dataset with 900 hazy/clean pairs grouped by haze density.
Download / Main link: https://github.com/XieQi2015/HazeRD
Extra link / notes: Used for aerial/remote sensing dehazing benchmarks.[web:6]

Download / Main link: Remote sensing haze dataset with multiple haze levels and diverse land-cover scenes for satellite image dehazing.
Real-world foggy street scenes with pixel-level annotations for semantic segmentation; includes unannotated foggy images.
column9: Extension of Cityscapes-style driving datasets to real fog.[web:4]

Download / Main link: Multi-condition atmospheric scene dataset including light/medium/plowed snow and other adverse visibility conditions for dehazing and low-light studies.
column9: Contains multiple snow levels and atmospheric degradations.[web:3]

Download / Main link: Exclusively Dark dataset with 7,363 low-light images across 10 lighting conditions and 12 object classes for detection and enhancement.
column9: Heavily used LLIE and detection benchmark.[web:7][web:10]

Download / Main link: Low-Light Visible and Infrared Paired dataset with 15,488 visible/infrared pairs for enhancement and fusion, focused on pedestrian detection.
LoLI-Street dataset with 30k train, 3k val, and 1k real low-light test images of street scenes across three illumination levels.
column9: Recent low-light benchmark focusing on urban streets.[web:7]

Download / Main link: SICE dataset with 589 scenes under varied illumination conditions, providing multi-exposure images useful for exposure correction and enhancement.
LIME dataset containing 10,000 natural low-light images used for low-light enhancement evaluation.
DPED dataset with smartphone and DSLR image pairs, often used for low-light and quality enhancement of mobile photos.
Full SID dataset with 5,094 short-exposure RAW images and corresponding long-exposure references (includes Sony and Fuji subsets).
Extended LOL dataset version 2 with more scenes and illumination variations for supervised low-light enhancement.
column9: Successor to LOL v1 with more diversity.[web:7]

Download / Main link: Laparoscopic Surgery Desmoking Dataset with 3,000 paired synthetic smoky/clean images plus 50 real smoky images.
column9: Medical desmoking benchmark with density-graded smoke.

Download / Main link: Synthetic and real snow dataset SRRS with about 16,000 images used for desnowing research.
column9: Includes both synthetic and realistic snow scenes.[web:5]

Download / Main link: Comprehensive Snow Dataset with 10,000 synthetic snowy images generated from RESIDE clean images via snowflake/snow streak synthesis.
column9: Controls snow transparency, size, and location for realism.[web:5]

Download / Main link: Snow training dataset with 3,000 outdoor synthetic snowy images for desnowing benchmarks.
column9: Often paired with Snow100K in desnowing studies.[web:5]

Description: LSRW dataset with 50 paired images (Huawei + Nikon) for low-light super-resolution and restoration.
Download / Main link: https://github.com/LoL-SRW/LSRW-dataset
Extra link / notes: Used for super-resolution under low-light conditions.[web:7]

Download / Main link: NTIRE desnowing challenge dataset built from Snow100K and related snow data for benchmarking desnowing models.
NTIRE nighttime dehazing dataset with real nighttime hazy images and corresponding references for joint low-light and haze removal.
column9: Targets simultaneous dehazing and low-light enhancement.[web:9]
